sub_title: Senior Manager/Expert Security Sector Governance (SSG/R) & Legal Reform (EOP, ex-CMP/3W) at Ministerie van Buitenlandse Zaken
summary:
Profile: Skilled, versatile international public lawyer, anti-corruption, regulatory- , security sector governance and reform (SSG/R) expert, ex-military (Navy). 20+ years of project delivery in 25+ countries, across multiple regions. 
Preferred Roles: Diplomat, (founding, executive, country) director, (academic) network developer, liaison, programme and project team-lead/senior manager, strategic adviser.
Personal: Value driven, committed, creative, communicative, flexible, enterprising, innovative, inclusive, results oriented. Narrative: https://www.eucap-som.eu/one-of-us-christiaan-moll/

Available for job opportunities

[{'company': {'id': 354899, 'name': 'Ministerie van Buitenlandse Zaken', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQGij2xmEG4knQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1691477973144?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=uhI6ETbpJ0ulZxE7G39BBNR9JKSTWIUxNSNqybZT8DI', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ministeriebz/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague, South Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Ministerie van Buitenlandse Zaken', 'description': '- Security Sector Governance & Reform (SSG/R), Legal Reform

To this end, the Netherlands Ministry of Foreign Affairs manages, selects and seconds (senior and top-level) managers and experts for staff positions.', 'title': 'Senior Manager/Expert Security Sector Governance (SSG/R) & Legal Reform (EOP, ex-CMP/3W)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 10077907, 'name': 'European Union Advisory Mission Ukraine (EUAM Ukraine)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQF4riXzwVFqmA/company-logo_400_400/0/1682404111116?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=jdmy_hrZCy3-H3cB2WEHexhzATdTOEimf4zMotfvzsc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/euam-ukraine/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Kyiv, Kyiv City, Ukraine', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'EU Advisory Mission Ukraine', 'description': '- Anti-Corruption, Regulatory-, Security Sector Governance & Reform (SSG/R)
Following the 2013/14 Maidan revolution, the European Union Advisory Mission (EUAM) has aimed to assist the Ukrainian authorities to sustainably reform its civilian security sector,  based on EU standards, international principles of ´Good Governance´ and ´Human Rights´. EUAM´s related Anti-Corruption portfolio (strategic advice, practical support) aligns with the comprehensive efforts of the EU Anti-Corruption Initiative (EUACI) (https://euaci.eu/).', 'title': 'Senior Adviser on Anti-Corruption', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 33259443, 'name': 'EUCAP Somalia', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHR0-pNXaU6pA/company-logo_400_400/0/1672545991140?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=n8uuUvs5k2u8DcFYCVS-5YapYZSptSbA2gqqw5x2BTM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/eucapsom/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Mogadishu', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'EUCAP Somalia', 'description': '- Anti-Corruption, Regulatory-, Security Sector Governance & Reform (SSG/R)
The European Capacity Building Mission in Somalia (EUCAP Somalia) is an EU Common Security and Defense Policy (CSDP) Mission that has rendered assistance to Somalia in strengthening its maritime security capacity, in order to enable it to enforce maritime law more effectively. The Rule of Law ´niches´ in the Mission mandate concern the development of regulatory capacity in the Somali Federal and Regional executive administrations, as well as of a credible functioning criminal justice chain.', 'title': 'Senior Legal Adviser/Chief of Rule of Law Advisory Unit', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 3149004, 'name': 'Lexchange', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFrq1868pEOeQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1590055211757?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=jc2PPXru7aSW7lEVReYbBoHd6HkcX1A6LH_Y9ghv7Dw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/lexchange/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Lexchange', 'description': "- Anti-Corruption, Regulatory-, Security Sector Governance & Reform (SSG/R)
Offering anti-corruption, regulatory governance and SSR-reform consultancy (focus: accountability, transparency, inclusiveness in process, legislation, organization; modes: strategic advice, assessment, capacity building, evaluation, programme- & project management, training) supportive of 'Good Governance' and 'Rule Of Law', for  international commissioning entities (e.g. OECD, OSCE, World Bank) in countries in transition, developing countries and fragile states, accross multiple regions.", 'title': 'Exc. Director, Founder', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1215910, 'name': 'European Academy for Law and Legislation (EALL)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQGIuzRRaAf8uw/company-logo_400_400/0/1519875205384?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=G-anPMF-Rgc0ZFlTFIWHuUdCMkuDl7pKTnh4ZVvQwDU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/european-academy-for-law-and-legislation-eall-/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'European Academy for Law and Legislation (EALL)', 'description': '- Regulatory Governance & Reform
